summary: 13M TEST / FULLY CHARGED / UNPLUGGED 24H / DROVE ALONG A RANGE OF SPEEDS FORWARD + REVERSE / 2 BLOCKS ON OREGON STREET / LEFT ON FULTON / U TURN / RIGHT ON RUSSEL / FORWARD MOTION STOPPED / POWER METER FLUCTUATES BETWEEN FULLY DISCHARGED AND 80% / SWITCHING TO N, WAIT 15S / SWITCH TO F / ACCELERATE VERY GRADUALLY FORWARD MOTION RESTORED 5M / NO POWER (REPEAT) 5X, RETURN TO GARAGE. THE VEHICLE WAS RECALLED IN 2012 FOR STEERING ISSUES. WE ARE UNSURE WHETHER IT WAS REPAIRED.
